com.rbs.transfer.validator

Class TransferValidatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbs.transfer.validator.TransferValidatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransferValidator

    @Component
public class TransferValidatorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransferValidator
    Validates input parameters including source and destination account. Checks whether source/destination accounts exists or not. Also checks source account's balance for sufficient funds.
